supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_01]: "Logging my time at the end of the day takes way too long. I have to click through so many screens just to add time for one project task. It's easily 10-15 minutes wasted."
[FDBK_02]: "The overall look is very dated. It feels clunky, and sometimes I'm not sure which button I'm supposed to press to submit my timesheet."
[FDBK_07]: "Making corrections is a nightmare. If I accidentally submit my timesheet before it's complete, getting it back, editing it, and resubmitting involves way too many steps and approvals."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Employees need a simpler, more intuitive workflow with fewer steps for entering, submitting, and editing time.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_03]: "I travel a lot for client meetings. It's impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone right after a meeting."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Employees need a mobile-friendly way (responsive site or app) to log time while away from their desks.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays. Trying to submit my timesheet before leaving is frustrating."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need the portal to remain fast and responsive, even during peak usage periods.

identified_themes.theme_name: Insufficient reporting / visibility of logged hours
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_05]: "Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours for the week broken down by project? I need this for my own records, but the portal doesn't offer a simple view like that. Generating reports seems impossible for regular users."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need easy-to-access summaries and basic reporting features to review their own hours.

identified_themes.theme_name: Project code selection and availability problems
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_08]: "The dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages, and I've picked the wrong one by mistake more than once because I was rushing."
[FDBK_10]: "Sometimes the project codes I need aren't even in the system yet, especially for new projects. I have to chase finance to get them added."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Employees need faster ways to locate valid project codes and a smoother process for adding new codes.

identified_themes.theme_name: Procrastination and data-accuracy concerns due to hassle
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_09]: "Honestly, the biggest issue is remembering to do it. Because it's such a hassle, I often put it off until Friday afternoon and then struggle to remember exactly what I worked on early in the week. My submitted hours are probably not very accurate sometimes."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Reducing friction and adding helpful reminders could improve on-time entries and data accuracy.

task_2_survey_design.survey_goal: To quantify how widespread each identified pain point is among employees and to determine the relative priority of potential improvements to the NovaTime portal.

survey_questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 (very dissatisfied) to 5 (very satisfied), how satisfied are you with the overall process of logging and submitting your time in NovaTime?
survey_questions.purpose: Establishes a baseline satisfaction level with the current workflow.

survey_questions.question_text: Which aspects of NovaTime cause you the most frustration or slow you down? (Select all that apply)
survey_questions.purpose: Identifies the most common pain points to target first.

survey_questions.question_text: How important is the ability to log your time from a mobile device (phone or tablet)?
survey_questions.purpose: Measures demand for mobile access to justify investment.

survey_questions.question_text: How often do you experience slow performance or system timeouts when using NovaTime?
survey_questions.purpose: Assesses the frequency and impact of performance issues.

survey_questions.question_text: Which types of time-tracking views or reports would you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
survey_questions.purpose: Clarifies user reporting needs to improve self-service insights.

survey_questions.question_text: If you could change one thing about NovaTime to make you more likely to enter your time promptly, what would it be?
survey_questions.purpose: Collects open-ended ideas and highlights the single most impactful change for each user.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Streamline and modernize the time-entry workflow and UI
supporting_evidence: scenario_description.txt: Management believes the portal is "cumbersome and inefficient" and hurting adoption.
initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_01]: Time entry takes 10–15 minutes with too many screens.
initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_02]: Interface feels clunky and confusing.
initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_07]: Editing submissions involves too many steps.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Provide mobile-friendly access (responsive design or dedicated app)
supporting_evidence: initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_03]: User cannot log time while traveling and wants phone entry.
scenario_description.txt: Goal includes increasing user adoption and data accuracy; mobile entry supports timely logging.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Improve system performance and scalability during peak periods
supporting_evidence: initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_04]: System becomes "incredibly slow" on Thursday/Friday afternoons.
scenario_description.txt: Reliable data capture depends on a responsive system.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Add easy-to-use weekly summary and basic reporting capabilities for employees
supporting_evidence: initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_05]: Users cannot easily see a weekly project breakdown and find reports "impossible".
scenario_description.txt: Improving data accuracy relies on users reviewing their own hours.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Enhance project code search, ordering, and request workflow
supporting_evidence: initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_08]: Dropdown list is massive and unordered, leading to mistakes.
initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_10]: Needed project codes are sometimes missing, forcing users to chase finance.
